Metadata.name: Controllable Characters Patch
Metadata.author: Donk
Metadata.description: Repackage of the controllable characters patch for P3FES by TGE, Warrior250 so it can be easily included with Aemulus It allows you to control all party members during battle. Some funky stuff happens if you attempt to switch personas on people other than the MC. don't do it ðŸ¤¡
